582170.name: theHunter - Deer Hunter
582170.description: theHunter: Deer Hunter DLC includes 3 months premium membership including full licenses to hunt All animals, access to All reserves, unlimited basic ammo and all the gear you need to hunt all 8 deer species in theHunter. Items included: 270 Bolt Action Rifle, 2-10x42 Rifle Scope, Doc Monsignor Jacket, Doc Monsignor Pants, Doc Monsignor Hat, Doc Monsignor Boots, Doc Monsignor Gloves, Roe Deer Caller, Red Deer Caller, Reindeer Deer Caller, Deer “Grunt” Caller, Whitetail Urine Spray, Mule Deer Urine Spray, Blacktail Deer Urine Spray, Sitka Deer Urine Spray, Roe Deer Scent.
582170.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 匈牙利语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 瑞典语, 土耳其语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
